text: Forough Farrokhzad (January 5, 1935 â€” February 13, 1967) () was an Iranian poet. She lived in Tehran. In 1967, she died in a car accident. She was thirty-two. Maryam Dilmaghani translated her poems to English in 2006. Category:Persian poets Category:1935 births Category:1967 deaths
title: Forough Farrokhzad
